Description:
Model
Brand: GAMEMAX
Model: VISTA AB


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Chassis SPCC: 0.6mm
Front Panel: Tempered Glass,Mesh
Top Panel: metal cover
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: ATX / E-ATX / Micro ATX / Mini ITX
Dust Filters: Bottom, right side panel and top cover with dust filter


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 2 (1*3.5HDD+2*2.5SSD  or  2*3.5HDD+1*2.5SSD)
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, 1 x Audio, RGB Controller, 1 x Remote, 3 x Button


Cooling System
Fan Options: Top: 3x120mm ,2x140mm (Fan optional)
Rear: 1x120mm (FN12A-C8I)
M/B Cover: 2x120mm (FN12A-C8I)
PSU Cover: 3x120mm (Reverse fan blade)(FN12A-C8I-R)
Radiator Options: Top: 120mm, 140mm,240mm,280mm,360mm
Rear: 120mm
M/B Cover: 120mm, 240mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 410 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 165 mm
Max PSU Length: 265 mm
Dimensions (H x W x D): (L)415*(W)210*(H)470mm


Additional Info
Features: Vista Mid-tower PC ATX case - Aesthetic looks, airflow focus, easy installation, and ample room for large GPU and cable management. Good build quality computer case made of heavy-duty steel metal frame and 4.0mm tempered glass.
Computer Case Focus on Cooling- The modular motherboard I/O allows you to move the motherboard to a higher/lower position for air-cooled/water-cooled systems. To ensure adequate airflow, a Total 6x120mm ARGB pre-installed (3x reversal and 3x forward fans, Fine mesh panel at the top, and on the PSU shroud side, help with a great ventilation
Easy Build Gaming PC Case- This case has a lot of flexibilities convenient for components installations: Removeable 5x Sides, Glass to Glass full view; Spacious PC case with Easy Cable Management, A seal plate on the top radiator bracket ensures no pressure leak when installing smaller than a 360 radiator/3x120mm fans at the top
Latest Gen. Large Graphics Card Ready- This Mid-tower Case is compatible with the largest NVIDIA 4000 series cards thanks to its ample room for graphics cards up to 410mm in length, and 165mm in height (for air cooling mode)
V4.0 ARGB HUB-PWM |5v ARGB Sync, Remote Control multi-featured hub, Magnetic design for easy installation, the magnet at the bottom of the controller can be firmly attached to the metal plate of the chassis, making installation easy!
Label: Chasis GAMEMAX Vista AB
